cta.title: Start Your Digital Transformation
cta.description: Join the companies already using PROCUREDATA to revolutionize their supply chain with Web3 technology.

kyb-onboarding.title: KYB Onboarding
kyb-onboarding.shortDesc: Instant supplier verification through sovereign identity (DID).
kyb-onboarding.fullDesc: Automate the verification process for new suppliers using Decentralized Identity (DID). Instead of weeks of document exchange and manual verifications, the supplier connects their wallet, signs an authorization, and PROCUREDATA automatically verifies their corporate registration against official sources. The result is a verified profile in minutes, not weeks.
kyb-onboarding.problem: Traditional supplier onboarding takes 2-4 weeks, requires manual PDF document exchange, and creates silos of outdated information. Each department maintains its own supplier list, generating inconsistencies and identity fraud risks.
kyb-onboarding.solution: PROCUREDATA generates a unique DID (did:ethr) for each supplier when connecting their wallet. This DID is verified against official corporate registries through Pontus-X. Once verified, any company in the ecosystem can trust that supplier without repeating verification, creating a decentralized trust network.
kyb-onboarding.testimonialQuote: We reduced supplier onboarding from 3 weeks to 15 minutes. The verified DID gives us complete confidence in each new partner.

huella-carbono.title: Carbon Footprint (Scope 3)
huella-carbono.shortDesc: Immutable and auditable ESG reports to comply with CSRD regulations.
huella-carbono.fullDesc: European CSRD regulations require large companies to report Scope 3 emissions (supply chain). PROCUREDATA allows you to request and aggregate ESG reports from all your suppliers in a structured manner, with each data point digitally signed and stored on blockchain. Auditors can verify authenticity without accessing original data.
huella-carbono.problem: Companies must report emissions from their entire supply chain (Scope 3), but collecting verifiable data from hundreds of suppliers is a manual, error-prone process with no guarantee of authenticity. Auditors question data reliability.
huella-carbono.solution: Each supplier uploads their ESG report to PROCUREDATA, which generates a cryptographic hash stored on Pontus-X. The company can aggregate data from multiple suppliers while maintaining individual traceability. Auditors verify integrity without seeing each supplier's original data.
huella-carbono.testimonialQuote: We can finally report Scope 3 with auditable data. Our investors and regulators are confident with blockchain traceability.

marketplace-euroe.title: Data Marketplace
marketplace-euroe.shortDesc: Secure trading of industrial assets paying with EUROe.
marketplace-euroe.fullDesc: Monetize your industrial data securely. Publish datasets on the PROCUREDATA marketplace, set price and usage conditions, and receive instant payments in EUROe (stablecoin backed 1:1 by euros). The smart contract ensures payment is released only when the buyer confirms access, eliminating payment risk.
marketplace-euroe.problem: Selling B2B data involves long negotiations, costly legal contracts, and international payment risk. Cross-border bank payments take days and have high fees. There's no standard for defining data usage conditions.
marketplace-euroe.solution: PROCUREDATA allows publishing datasets with fixed price or subscription in EUROe. The smart contract acts as escrow: it holds payment until the buyer confirms access. ODRL policies define exactly what the buyer can do with the data. Everything is recorded on blockchain.
marketplace-euroe.testimonialQuote: We sell consumer trend data globally. EUROe eliminated international banking friction and we receive payments instantly.

kill-switch.title: Data Kill-Switch
kill-switch.shortDesc: Real-time access revocation in case of security breaches.
kill-switch.fullDesc: When a security breach is detected, every second counts. PROCUREDATA's Kill-Switch allows you to revoke all access to shared data with a single click. The smart contract instantly invalidates all active access tokens and logs the action in an immutable audit log for regulatory compliance.
kill-switch.problem: In a data breach, revoking traditional access can take hours or days: you need to contact each partner, update APIs, manually invalidate tokens. Meanwhile, data remains exposed.
kill-switch.solution: PROCUREDATA's RevokeAccessButton executes a smart contract that invalidates all Access Tokens in a single blockchain transaction. Revocation is immediate, global, and permanently recorded in the audit log to demonstrate compliance to regulators.
kill-switch.testimonialQuote: When we detected the breach, we cut access in 3 seconds with a single click. It literally saved the company from a regulatory disaster.

pasaporte-digital.title: Digital Passport (DPP)
pasaporte-digital.shortDesc: Complete product traceability aggregating data from multiple suppliers.
pasaporte-digital.fullDesc: The Digital Product Passport (DPP) is mandatory in the EU from 2026 for textiles, batteries, and electronics. PROCUREDATA allows each supply chain actor to add their information (material origin, processes, certifications) to a common registry. The end consumer scans a QR code and sees the product's entire history.
pasaporte-digital.problem: DPP regulations require complete product traceability, but data is fragmented across dozens of suppliers with incompatible systems. Creating a unified registry manually is impossible at scale.
pasaporte-digital.solution: Each supplier signs their DPP contribution with their DID. PROCUREDATA aggregates all signatures into an immutable registry. The final product has a QR code linking to the complete DPP on blockchain. Anyone can verify the authenticity of each link.
pasaporte-digital.testimonialQuote: We complied with EU DPP regulations before anyone else. Our customers scan the QR and see the garment's entire journey, from cotton to store.

compute-to-data.title: Compute-to-Data
compute-to-data.shortDesc: Train AI on sensitive data without exposing it outside the sandbox.
compute-to-data.fullDesc: The most valuable data (medical, financial, industrial) cannot be shared due to regulation or competition. Compute-to-Data inverts the paradigm: instead of sending data to the algorithm, you send the algorithm to the data. Your AI model runs in a secure sandbox alongside the data, and you only receive results (statistics, trained model), never the original data.
compute-to-data.problem: Companies want to monetize sensitive data or train AI on it, but regulations (GDPR, HIPAA) prohibit moving it. Confidentiality agreements are not sufficient technical guarantee.
compute-to-data.solution: PROCUREDATA provisions an isolated sandbox where the data provider deposits information and the consumer deposits their algorithm. The sandbox executes the code and returns only results. Data never leaves the controlled environment. Everything is audited on blockchain.
compute-to-data.testimonialQuote: We monetized 10 years of clinical data without violating GDPR. AI trains here, data never leaves the hospital. Revolutionary.

gestion-recalls.title: Recall Management
gestion-recalls.shortDesc: Instant tracking of defective batches across the entire chain.
gestion-recalls.fullDesc: When a defective component is detected, identifying all affected products can take weeks with traditional systems. PROCUREDATA uses DataLineage to instantly track which supplier batches were used in which final products, and which are already in customers' hands. A recall that took 2 weeks now takes 2 minutes.
gestion-recalls.problem: A defective component can be in thousands of products distributed globally. Identifying affected batches requires cross-referencing spreadsheets from multiple systems, a process taking days or weeks while defective products remain on the market.
gestion-recalls.solution: PROCUREDATA maintains a data lineage graph connecting each component to each final product and its location. A DataLineage query instantly identifies all products affected by a defective batch, enabling surgical recalls in minutes.
gestion-recalls.testimonialQuote: We identified 1,247 vehicles affected by a defective airbag in 47 seconds. Before it took us at least 2 weeks.

financiacion-defi.title: DeFi Financing
financiacion-defi.shortDesc: Blockchain-verified delivery history to access credit.
financiacion-defi.fullDesc: Small suppliers often cannot access financing because they lack traditional credit history. PROCUREDATA allows using blockchain-verified delivery history as reputational collateral. A farmer who has delivered punctually for 5 years has a verifiable score that banks or DeFi protocols can use to offer credit.
financiacion-defi.problem: SMEs and farmers have difficulty accessing credit because traditional banks don't recognize their delivery history as collateral. Without credit, they cannot grow.
financiacion-defi.solution: PROCUREDATA generates a reputation score based on verified transaction history on blockchain. This score is presented to financial entities (traditional banks or DeFi protocols) as proof of reliability, unlocking access to credit with better conditions.
financiacion-defi.testimonialQuote: My 8-year history of punctual deliveries opened doors to credit that traditional banks always denied. Now I can expand the farm.

cadena-frio.title: Cold Chain Audit
cadena-frio.shortDesc: IoT sensors record temperature immutably to resolve disputes.
cadena-frio.fullDesc: Transporting perishable products (pharmaceuticals, food) requires maintaining the cold chain. When there's a dispute about who broke the chain, it's word against word. PROCUREDATA connects IoT sensors that record each temperature reading on blockchain, creating an immutable and indisputable record.
cadena-frio.problem: When a shipment arrives damaged due to cold chain break, no one wants to take responsibility. Temperature records are manipulable and each party presents what suits them. Disputes take months to resolve.
cadena-frio.solution: IoT sensors send readings to Edge Functions that verify thresholds and notarize each reading on blockchain. If there's a temperature breach, it's recorded with exact timestamp. Disputes are resolved in minutes by consulting the immutable record.
cadena-frio.testimonialQuote: The dispute about who broke the cold chain on a vaccine shipment was resolved in 10 minutes by consulting the blockchain record. Before it took us months.

licencias-odrl.title: ODRL Licenses
licencias-odrl.shortDesc: Dynamic contract negotiation with temporal restrictions.
licencias-odrl.fullDesc: Data is not 'sold' but licensed under specific conditions. ODRL (Open Digital Rights Language) allows defining restrictions like 'research only', '30 days only', 'EU territory only'. PROCUREDATA translates these restrictions into self-executing smart contracts, automatically granting or revoking access.
licencias-odrl.problem: Negotiating data licenses with multiple providers requires lawyers, custom contracts, and manual compliance tracking. Temporal restrictions are forgotten and access is never revoked.
licencias-odrl.solution: PROCUREDATA's NegotiationChat allows visually defining restrictions (duration, purpose, territory). These are translated into standard ODRL policies deployed as smart contracts. Access is automatically revoked upon expiration, without human intervention.
licencias-odrl.testimonialQuote: We negotiated data access from 6 pharmaceuticals with specific restrictions for each. All automated, contracts self-execute and revoke.
